title: Ticket Schema
description: Schema for email ticket JSON files created by the routing system

department.description: Department the ticket is routed to

confidence.description: Confidence score of the triage classification (0-1), or null if not available

summary.description: Summary of the email, either from triage or extracted from email

draft_reply.description: Draft reply generated by the draft agent

raw_body.description: Raw body content of the original email

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the ticket was created
